title: Switch!
description: Switch! is a fast-paced action game with one-touch gameplay. You must switch from wall to wall to avoid oncoming objects and collect stars to increase your score. Collecting 5 stars in a row will make you invincible for a short time. As you progress, the gameplay changes, getting faster and harder. The longer you last, the better your score. With appealing graphics and endless gameplay, Switch! will keep you entertained for hours.
